attributes.action: Ban swearing on TV and Radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many 'F' words. Why? Whats the point? Get back to good pubic standards of decency. Stop the Ross-dross and promote proper use of the English language. Stop swearing on the Radio and TV!

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/no-swearing/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
